question: The tribal population in Andaman and Nicobar Islands belongs to which of the following races?
explanation: The tribal population in Andaman and Nicobar Islands belongs to the Negroid race. The Andaman Islands are home to four \'Negrito\' tribes – the Great Andamanese, Onge, Jarawa and Sentinelese. The Nicobar Islands are home to two \'Mongoloid\' tribes – the Shompen and Nicobarese. The \'Negrito\' tribes are believed to have arrived in the islands from Africa up to 60,000 years ago.
